collection-target.influx-query: SELECT assetId, assetLabel, customerId, mysql_info_schema_innodb_metrics_os_os_data_reads_total, mysql_info_schema_innodb_metrics_os_os_data_writes_total, mysql_info_schema_innodb_metrics_os_os_data_fsyncs_total, mysql_info_schema_innodb_metrics_lock_lock_deadlocks_total FROM MySQL WHERE assetId='__ASSET_ID__' AND time > now() - 5m
